body_html:
I've added exclusive scan functionality to Eigen here: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/197/implement-exclusive-scan-option-for-tensor/diff.
I also have a version of ScanOp that has an optional exclusive=True/False argument, which I can push in a new PR once we finish this one.
body_text:
I've added exclusive scan functionality to Eigen here: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/197/implement-exclusive-scan-option-for-tensor/diff.
I also have a version of ScanOp that has an optional exclusive=True/False argument, which I can push in a new PR once we finish this one.
body:
I've added exclusive scan functionality to Eigen here: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/197/implement-exclusive-scan-option-for-tensor/diff.
I also have a version of `ScanOp` that has an optional `exclusive=True/False` argument, which I can push in a new PR once we finish this one.
